title: JSW MG Motor to invest Rs 3,000 cr in India by 2025, to launch five new cars
description: JSW MG Motor India is set to invest Rs 3000 crore by 2025 for capacity expansion and new product launches. The company aims to introduce 5 new vehicles, including electric and internal combustion engine models. Employee Stock Options program also initiated.
